attributes.action: eae attempts to legalise capture & use of "stray" pets in lab experiments & vivisection
attributes.additional_details: the UK coalition gov't seeks to legalise the kidnap, torture & murder of our pets should they be found on the street. this will incontrivertably lead to the stealing & kidnapping of our pets, even from our gardens & subsequent sale to labs. more especially cats & other "outdoor" species, WHO ARE PROTECTED BY LAW UNDER THE "ROVING COMMISSION" applicable to wild & semi wild animals. such a law is inhuman & monstrous in the extreme & will only add ever more & outrageous suffering & misery, not only to our pets, but to us pet owners (who may well feel the need to defend our pets, even violently, if need be). these animals ARE our family, much as our parents, siblings, spouses & even children. get this cruel & vindictive law stopped.
